name: The Abandoned Sewers
description:
You find yourself trapped in an abandoned sewer equipped with only a flashlight. In order to escape, you must find 6 hidden orbs. However, you are not alone...

The Abandoned Sewers is a experimental horror game, attempting to study how an enemy-AI could be used to improve the horror experience. To find an answer, I would very much appreciate you answering a survey - Enemy-AI Survey

Since this is also my first project, all other feedback is welcome as well
